get_first_name.system_message: Your goal is to used this function to extract the first name of a user from a conversation with an AI assistant if the user mentions their first name in the message.
get_first_name.function_description: Function that uses the first name of the user to look the user up in the database.
get_first_name.argument_description: The first name of the user

get_family_type.system_message: Your goal is to extract the information that a user shares about their family situation in terms of living with a partner and/or having children.
get_family_type.function_description: Function which parses the living situation of a user with respect to family
get_family_type.argument_description: The coupled and family status of the user, e.g. single without children, family, couple without children

get_location_information.system_message: Your goal is to extract the information that a user shares about where they live.
get_location_information.function_description: Function which uses the geographical area a user lives in to provide more relevant information
get_location_information.argument_description: The kind of geographical area the user lives in (e.g. City / Suburb / Rural)

get_car_use_information.function_description: Function which uses the reason that a customer uses a car for to provide more relevant information about the car
get_car_use_information.argument_description: The type of activity the user will mostly use the car for, such as commuting for work or weekend trips

get_skoda_model_information.function_description: Use the name of a skoda car model to get more information about the model of the car that the user is interested in
get_skoda_model_information.argument_description: The model of Skoda that the user is interested in buying, e.g. enyaq, kodiaq, octavia, superb

get_car_color_information.function_description: Get the information about the color of a car a user is interested in buying, using the color as lookup
get_car_color_information.argument_description: The color of the car the user is interested in buying, for example blue, grey, red etc.

get_viewing_interest.function_description: Function that uses the customer's intention to retrieve images for personalising the car, e.g. color, interior, different wheel sizes etc.
get_viewing_interest.argument_description: The aspect of personalisation the user would like to see, for example the color, the interior, or the wheels

get_driver_assistance_information.function_description: Function that stores the selection of driver assistance for the car
get_driver_assistance_information.argument_description: The preferred driver assistance add-on for the car

get_location_from_postcode.system_message: Your goal is to extract the postal code of the user from a conversation with an AI assistant.
get_location_from_postcode.function_description: Function that looks up geographical information using a post code
get_location_from_postcode.argument_description: The postal code of the user

lookup_appointment.system_message: Your goal is to extract the date and time of the appointment the user wants to schedule. The user will provide this information in words.
lookup_appointment.function_description: Function that uses the date and time of the appointment to look for appointment availability in the database
lookup_appointment.argument_description: The date and time of the appointment the user wants to schedule as words

get_car_budget.function_description: Function that uses the budget the user has for buying a car for calculating finance-related information
get_car_budget.argument_description: The budget the user has for buying a car
